text: @DrZweliMkhize @naledimoshesh @CyrilRamaphosa @AdvoBarryRoux We no longer have natural cuase death Dr Gcwabe. Just before Covid-19 landed MAGIC happened all Patients were healed and discharged. The only sick people in hospital now are Covid-19 patients. Wow, sabakho sir enjoy us.
